name: Marcellin the Cheese Commits Tax Evasion
name_original: Marcellin the Cheese Commits Tax Evasion
description:
We strongly recommend the game be played in fullscreen (F11 when game is running)

Please Note: A Gamepad is required to play.

Attention, all Gamers: Marcellin the Cheese is in great danger and he needs your help to wipe out the Rats in the Cluny Nightclub. To help him, all he needs is your credit card number you to play this game. But, you gotta be quick, the IRS is closing in, so bash some rats (which Marcellin gets paid per rat bashed and of course doesn't pay tax on that income) and get out of there.

Warning: This game contains cartoon blood and violence. Like, a lot.

===========================================================
Controls
=============================================================

Please Note: An Gamepad is required to play.

Left Thumbstick: Move Marcellin
Right Thumbstick: Rotate Marcellin
Right Trigger: Swing Cricket Bat
Left Button: Adjust Zoom Level
Left Trigger or Right Button: Dash
Start: Pause

=============================================================
The Team
=============================================================

This game is Team Spice Boys'  Submission to the Portsmouth University Game Jam 2021 and was completed in 32 hours by:
Euan Damant - Lead Programmer
Tom Ford - Character Artist
James Mamone - Environment Artist
James Rance - Programmer
